name: ジェミニウイング
summary: Gemini Wing in an arcade game created by Tecmo, released in 1987. A vertically-scrolling shooter, one or two players control a futuristic aircraft travelling over numerous terrains and shooting at enemies of an animalistic or insectoid design.
info:
• 中文名: 捉虫敢死队
  • 发行: テクモ
  • 别名: Gemini Wing
  • 平台: ARC
  • 平台: C64
  • 平台: Amiga
  • 平台: MSX
  • 平台: X68000
  • 游戏类型: 纵版STG
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1987年
